thread.title_full: Topless Demi Rose leaves little to imagination as she strips off for eye-popping display - Daily Star

author: Dan Laurie
title: Topless Demi Rose leaves little to imagination as she strips off for eye-popping display - Daily Star
text: Demi Rose is not one to shy away from the camera and sent fans wild with her latest batch of smoking hot social media snaps. The 28-year-old model logged into her Instagram page on Thursday (December 28) to share not one but three topless snaps with her 20million followers as she put on a daring display as she posed standing in a field wearing a purple skirt. She protected her modesty with two pink roses covering her nipples, with several flower petals running over her shoulder and down her back. Demi playfully ran her fingers though her trademark raven tresses as her locks fluttered in the breeze and enhanced her facial features with a glam makeup palette. READ MORE: Want more showbiz? Daily Star has just the thing for you! READ MORE: Want more TV? Daily Star has just the thing for you! Captioning the sultry shots, she wrote: "The way of the Rose" and unsurprisingly, some of her excited fans rushed to leave a comment for the stunning influencer in the comment section. One fan gushed: "Divinely gorgeous, all the way." A second person wrote: "What a beautiful lady." A third person penned: "What a view." It comes after Demi nearly caused an internet meltdown after she posed up a storm in the back of a London cab wearing a teeny skirt that bared plenty of her sun-kissed skin last week. Posing up a storm in the back of a famous London black cab, Demi oozed beauty and style in her skimpy outfit. For the shoot, she slipped her figure into a red lace and white dress. Smouldering to the camera, she leaned back and crossed her legs - flaunting her endless pins for her fans to see. The stunner almost flashed her knickers too thanks to the frock’s teeny hemline. Demi teamed her barely-there dress with a white lace jacket adorned with fur on the sleeves and neck. Amping up the style, she rocked a pair of matching fluffy cream boots. Looking nothing short of sensational, Demi finished off her look with a bright red buret. In another snap, Demi posted next to a signature London post box. In the caption, Demi penned: "Fun in London town. Sending letters to Santa." And unsurprisingly, fans were quick to pile high the compliments in the comments section. One person said: "So beautiful." Someone else added: "Absolutely astounding." A third chimed in and gushed: "Stunning beauty." Another fan proclaimed: "Such a fine woman." Echoing their thoughts, a fifth agreed: “Super sexy.” A sixth smitten follower then wrote: “Looking phenomenal.” Join the Daily Star Soaps WhatsApp for all the latest spoilers and exclusives It has been reported that Demi has been raking in over £1million for her photoshoots. According to The Sun, she runs a company called Productions Ltd, which last year boasted £1.2m in cash and assets. Demi has been working in the modelling industry for a number of years and originally grew popular on Myspace before joining Instagram when she was 18-years-old. She then received worldwide stardom when she dated American rapper Tyga in 2016.
